name: Artropolis, Inc.
description: Artropolis is an award winning Minneapolis web design firm with over 500 sites to its credit. We opened our doors in 1994 - making us one of the original Minneapolis web design firms. Our web design, development and e-commerce capabilities are as diverse as our clients who range from Fortune 500 to Non-Profits, small retail shops to e-commerce sites for national brands and just about everything else in between.
